item.title: Have a Good Funeral, My Friend... Sartana Will Pay
item.description: Have a Good Funeral, My Friend... Sartana Will Pay is a 1970 Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuliano Carnimeo, written by Roberto Gianviti and starring Gianni Garko.

item.title: Find a Place to Die
item.description: Find a Place to Die (1968) is a spaghetti western starring Jeffrey Hunter and Pascale Petit. It was co-written and directed by Giuliano Carnimeo with sequences directed by Hugo Fregonese who also produced the film.

item.title: ...e vennero in quattro per uccidere Sartana!
item.description: ...e vennero in quattro per uccidere Sartana! is an Italian 1969 Spaghetti Western film directed by Demofilo Fidani.

item.title: The Five Man Army
item.description: The Five Man Army is a 1969 Italian Zapata Western film taking place during the Mexican Revolution.
